summary: Simple website to track start attempts with buttons for Start, No Start, and Reset. Displays start percentage, start count, and no-start count with multiple decimal points.
architectural_notes: Website tracks start vs no-start attempts with live percentage calculation

existing_features.title: Create a Start button that increments the start count when clicked
Create a No Start button that increments the no-start count when clicked
Create a Reset button that clears both start and no-start counts, resetting them to zero
Display the total number of starts on the page
Display the total number of no-starts on the page
Calculate and display the start percentage as (starts / total attempts) Ã— 100, where total attempts equals starts plus no-starts, showing multiple decimal places

Design a clean, minimalist interface with a distinctive visual theme using warm earth tones (terracotta, sage green, cream) with modern sans-serif typography and generous spacing for a calming, focused tracking experience

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Start button to increment start count
Create No Start button to increment no-start count
Create Reset button to clear all counts
Calculate and display start percentage with multiple decimal points
